name: Fly Power
description:
Fly power is a low-poly shooter arcade. Play as ‘Fly Killer,’ a notorious weapon master who must shoot Fly's to unlock all three weapons.

You start with a semi-automatic pistol. Shoot your way through to unlock 2 additional weapons - automatic MP5 and fast-automatic AK47.

There are 3 different fly's that haunt you. The slowest one gives the most damage, almost half of your total health. The fastest takes only 10 damage but spawns more often than the other two. Middle one takes 20 damage and is middle-fast.

To make it easier for you to unlock all weapons we have given you 1 health per second regeneration.

Good Luck !
